title: Development of Self-Regulated Learning Strategies in Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Concepts and Online Learning Experiences
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers, Domain Expertise: Intermediate, Assessment Method: Formative Assessment-Centric, Technology Environment: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)

learning_goals: Establish weekly goals and execution plans within four weeks for online science content learning
Complete over 80% of nonlinear learning content in a mobile microlearning environment by applying self-regulated learning strategies (planning, monitoring, adjusting) in Week 8
Analyze three or more specific self-regulated learning strategies through reflective journals at the course conclusion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
